Key Match Events: Qazim Laci scored the opening goal for Albania in the 11th minute
Ante Budimir and Andrej Kramaric scored for Croatia in the 74th and 76th minutes respectively
Klaus Gjasula scored an own goal for Albania in the 94th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: Albania is ranked 66th in the world
Sylvinho, the manager of Albania, is a former Arsenal, Barcelona and Brazil full-back
Albania set a new record for the fastest goal scored in European Championship history when opening the scoring against Italy
Others: The game ended in a 2-2 draw
The game was played in Hamburg, Germany
